meanings.definition: A person or thing that precedes the coming or development of someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The forerunner of the team arrived early to set up for the event.
meanings.sent2: The blooming flowers were a forerunner of spring's arrival.
meanings.sent3: The forerunner of the party, the energetic dog, greeted guests at the door.
meanings.sent4: The first raindrops were the forerunner of the storm that followed.
meanings.sent5: The distant sound of thunder acted as a forerunner to the approaching storm.
